entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -26.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 04:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

Temperature: -26.2°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
